tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.donkey_soup: Rich soupy made of rare meat, like dragon in sky.

tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fish_flavor: No fish but taste like fish, magic of spicy food.

tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.samsa.maxim: Hey young human! Try dis yummy samsa!
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.cold_style_: Snowball cold fish. Make you feel cold.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.mantou.maxi: Simple steamed bun, warm your tummy.

tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pork_bone_s: Smelly good, yummy, make you strong.

tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.slime_ball_: Eat slimy rice, hope you stick together tonight!
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.fearsome_th: One spoon of thick soup make world sad.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pufferfish_: Add story to your life by drink dis soup.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.golden_sala: Shiny gold fancy salad, very rich.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.baozi.maxim: Steamy hot buns, full of happy in each bite.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.scramble_eg: Spoon of egg n red fruit on rice, happy overload.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.borscht.max: Sweet sour, make hungry, sky yummy.

tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.udon_noodle: Bouncy soft noodles, rich tasty soup.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.dongpo_pork: "No meat, you thin. No bamboo, you vulgar."

tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.beef_meatba: Healing, warm, life-change cow ball soup.
tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.braised_bee: Soft yummy beef wif tasty sauce - best friend of rice lovers.

advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.root.d: Meow! Add sparkly fancy things to the world!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.iron_k: Get your first pointy cutter thingy! Nya~
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.nether: Make the pointy tool extra spooky and strong! Purr...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.oil.de: Poke the oinky beast with sharp thing to get greasy slippy stuff! Meow!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.danger: Poke the big pig man with pointy tool for scary fun! Nya~
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.choppi: Use sharp cutter on wood board to make new stuff! Purr...

Craft a hat from grass! Simple and fun!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.flower: Make a flower hat, so nice and soothing! Meow!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.tomato: Wear grass hat and break plants to find tiny seeds! Nya~
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.iron_h: Use scratchy metal on wet dirt to make little plants grow! Purr...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.rice_p: Pick rice, miss old times... meow
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.fish_r: Put fish in water dirt, make plants grow super fast! Nya!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.caterp: Find a fat wiggly worm in the grass! Meow!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.feed_c: Feed baby chicken with wiggly worm! Yum! Purr...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.dual_c: Get both green and red spicy pods! Hot hot! Nya~
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.farmer: Wear all farmer clothes, move faster in water! Meow!
Light the fire, make tasty meals! Purr...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.pot.de: Craft a sizzle pot, place it on heat to start cooking! Nya~
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.add_oi: Put oil in pot, or use spoon, begin cooking fun! Meow!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.stir_f: Add ingredients, mix with spoon. When done, eat from bowl! Purr...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.burn_h: Pot gets angry if you take wrong thing, burn your paw! Nya~
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.stockp: Craft a large pot, place on heat for soup! Meow!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.add_br: To make different soups, need different liquids first! Purr...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.make_s: Add things to pot, cover with lid. When finished, open and eat with bowl! Nya~
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.burn_h: Big pot with hot liquid can burn paw if you take wrong thing! Meow!
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.appren: Get a bowl of tangy red broth! Yummy! Purr...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.nitrog: Go up 100 blocks with toot power! Zoom! Nya~
Ascend 300 blocks with gas power! So high! Meow!
Rise 1000 blocks with toot force! Wow! Purr...
Soar 3000 blocks with gaseous boost! Incredible! Nya~
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.scarec: Use scarecrow to protect growing plants! Safe and sound! Meow!
Use a skull instead of pumpkin on scarecrow! Spooky cool! Purr...
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.transm: Eat using the Magic Food Pouch
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.millst: Ride a hee haw to make squishy rock go
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.oil_po: Put the grease jar under the squishy rock
Pull the white blob into long strings
advancements.kaleidoscope_cookery.steame: Put the steamy thing on heat to make puffy food
Meat Bun Beat Doggo, No Give Back!
Sneek and throw meat bun at wolf to make it feel bettur
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.stockpot.hea: How to Use Big Soupy Pot
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.stockpot.tex: To cook wif big soupy pot, put it on hot thing.
First, add soup base to big pot.
After add all stuff, cover pot wif big pot hat.
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.pot.text_1: To cook wif sizzle pot, put it on hot thing.
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.pot.text_2: First, add slippy liquid to pot.
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.pot.text_4: After add all stuff, use food scooper to mixy mix!
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.pot.text_5: Den, after many mixy and wait a bit...
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.steamer.head: How to Place Steamy Stacky
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.steamer.text: To cook wif steamer, put it on hot thing.
Den, put more steamers on top to stack higher...
But one hot thing can only heat up to 8 steamers...
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.steamer_1.te: From top, put stuff into steamer.
Steamers wif stuff inside can also be stacked.
After place, right-click to cover steamer and start steam.
When cooking done, take off steamer lid.
Finally, take out steamers wif finished food layer by layer.
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.enamel_basin: Open shiny bowl lid to store slippy liquid.
You can grease your food scooper using 1 portion of slippy liquid from shiny bowl.
The greased food scooper can add slippy liquid to sizzle pot.
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.millstone.te: Right-click wif stuff in hand to put into squishy rock.
Stuff dropped on top from above also go inside.
Some animals can be placed near to make it go.
Then, squishy rock start working on stuff.
After one full round, stuff turn into products and pop out from hole.
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.shawarma_spi: How to Use Spinny Meat Stick
Stuff can be put into top and bottom parts of spinny meat stick.
Each part can hold up to 8 cookable food of same type.
Give red glowy signal to start cooking.
But it burns if you take food wif bare hands from spinning stick that is on.
Safer way is to use pointy cutter to take food...
...or turn off spinny stick before take food.
When stuff inside sizzle pot or big soupy pot, right-click wif blank food paper to remember what's inside.
Later, right-click pot wif food paper again. It will add all remembered stuff from your inventory.
kaleidoscope_cookery.ponder.tag.kitchen_: Start path of the cooking master! Meow!
